title: In NHC, what are the laws and rights of homeowners who have neighbors trees that are growing onto their properties? If it is legal to trim the protrusion must the owner of the property from which the tree originates provide reasonable use of their property for ladders or  equipment  in order to make the trim and complete the work?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2012/12/whos-responsible-for-picking-up-my-neighbors-leaves-when-they-fall-in-my-yard/
